The number of confirmed COVID-19 cases in England so far as at 25 December is 1,906,291 (3,386.7 cases per 100,000 population). In the seven days to 20 December, there were 199,777 new confirmed cases (354.9 new cases per 100,000). In the seven days to 13 December, there were 124,156 new cases and so the new cases have risen by 61% (75,621 extra cases).
